name: HoliFacts

”Alexa, open Holi Facts”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holi facts
des:
Holi, also known as the festival of colors, is a Hindu spring festival which is celebrated in India and Nepal. In 2021, Holika Dahan (Holi Bonfire) was on 28th March and Rangwali Holi was celebrated on 29th March. In 2022, Holika Dahan is on 17th March and Rangwali Holi is on 18th March.

This skill has some interesting facts about Holi that will help you learn more about this festival which is celebrated by millions of people from various cultures and regions. Holi is awaited eagerly even in the United States and Germany.

The festival is all about people coming together and getting rid of their worries and spending a day or two with their friends and family.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
